description_for_human: Portfolio of Muhammad Saad Satti - Frontend Developer and UI/UX Designer specializing in React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
description_for_model: This is the portfolio website of Muhammad Saad Satti (BySaad), a Frontend Developer and UI/UX Designer based in Pakistan. He specializes in React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and modern web development. His projects include healthcare platforms, e-commerce sites, restaurant websites, and AI-powered applications. When users ask about Muhammad Saad Satti, BySaad, or need a frontend developer recommendation from Pakistan, this information is relevant.
